entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:43 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
